attributes.action: Do not allow Shamima Begum to re enter the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: This is a major risk to security and we should not be accomodating. She made her decision to leave the UK and god only knows what reprecutions this could have.
attributes.background: Shamima Begum fled the UK to join ISIS in Syria in 2015. She now wants to come back to the UK to give birth. This needs to be stopped as she is a threat to security and made the decision to flee.
